message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'd like to sell it to you for $12,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the product, $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for it.  What do you think?

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $12,000 is a bit steep, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I believe the product's value will benefit you in the long run, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $11,000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $9,500 for the product. If you're not able to come down to that price, I'll have to take my business elsewhere.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I can offer it to you for $10,500. It's a fair price considering the product's value and what you're willing to pay.
